title: looking for script
content: I am looking for a high contrast script face. Something kind of modern or unique looking- but could also be used on something traditional like a wedding invite. Any suggestions?
author: Marco Polo

comments.content:
I like [Silk Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823045618/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/silk-script/) by Canada Type. It's unique all right, and has alternates.  
or  
 [Serena](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823045618/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/serena/)
[FF Pitu!](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823045618/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_pitu_ot/) (If it may be a little edgier.)

Mommie or Narziss by Hubert Jocham  
Burgues Script by Ale Paul  
Zaner by Paul D Hunt
